metadata.dc:title: The therapeutic dimension of public relational space
metadata.dc:description: We present a working model infamily therapy organized around the representationby the team of professionals of public spacecomponents of interpersonal communication. Weanalyze the conceptual components of privateand public spaces and practical work with thembased on the adaptation of the therapeutic teamto the developmental stages of the family duringthe therapy process, which allows to define a itineraryguide in his progress up to his conclusion (AU)
